scripts.push-master: git add -A && git commit -m 'new deployment' && git push
scripts.push-gh: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix dist master`:gh-pages --force
scripts.push-gh-old: cd dist && cp -R ../dist-temp/. . && git add -A && git commit -m 'new content' && git push
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run push-master && npm run push-gh
